description:
User processing layer - user-adjustable DSP parameters.

# Processing Layer 1 of 3 First layer in 3-layer DSP chain: **User → Array → Preset**

# Internal Type Part of `SpeakerOutputChannel`. Path: `/audio/output/speaker/1/user`

# Purpose User-accessible controls for everyday adjustments. Remains editable even with factory preset applied (preset is in separate layer).

# Structure - `mute`: Channel mute - `gain`: User gain (-144.0 to +15.0 dB) - `polarity`: Signal polarity (+1 or -1) - `delay`: User delay (0.0 to 2.0 seconds) - alignment, lip sync - `hpf`: High-pass filter type (Off, 6dB, 12dB slopes) - `hpf_freq`: HPF corner frequency (10.0-22000.0 Hz) - `generator_mix`: Test signal mix mode (Off, Replace, Mix) - `eq`: 10-band parametric equalizer

# EQ Configuration User EQ has 10 fully parametric bands (vs 5 in array, 15 in preset). Bands updated individually via `SetSpeakerOutputUserEqBand`.

delay.description: User delay in seconds (range: 0.0 to 2.0) for alignment/lip-sync

eq.description: 10-band parametric equalizer. Updated via band-specific endpoints.

generator_mix.description: Test signal generator mix mode (Off, Replace, Mix)

title: UserProcessing
